text:
i found the answer : 
"Currently the HubSpot Webhook does not support the `num_associated_contacts` as this property (also known as calculated property) is treated differently on the back end. Here's a list of calulated properties:
Contacts:
• days_to_close
• recent_conversion_event_name
• recent_conversion_date
• first_conversion_event_name
• first_conversion_date
• num_unique_conversion_events
• num_conversion_events
Deals
• num_associated_contacts"
